comment: /**  * The index the operation failed on. Might return {@code null} if it can't be derived.  */
code: /**  * The index the operation failed on. Might return {@code null} if it can't be derived.  */ @Nullable public final String index() {     return index. }

comment: /**  * The index the operation failed on. Might return {@code -1} if it can't be derived.  */
code: /**  * The index the operation failed on. Might return {@code -1} if it can't be derived.  */ public final int shardId() {     return shardId. }
/**  * The reason of the failure.  */ public final String reason() {     return reason. }
/**  * The status of the failure.  */ public final RestStatus status() {     return status. }
/**  * The cause of this failure  */ public final Throwable getCause() {     return cause. }
